Wraps help detoxify the body as the vitamins and minerals of seaweed power help restore and heal damaged skin.Therapists in a spa rub a mixture of kelp powder and mineral oil base over the body. This stimulates blood flood and exfoliates the skin. The minerals and vitamins are able to penetrate the pores of the skin.What is included?- 1lb 100% Kosher Certified Seaweed Powder- 100% No Questions Asked Guarantee.
